response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present an extraordinary opportunity for you to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance, which I believe could greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its unique qualities and the expertise it offers, I am extending an exclusive invitation to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000.

This offer is designed to provide you with a significant advantage, allowing you to leverage the product's capabilities to their fullest potential. By accepting this offer, you will not only secure a valuable asset but also potentially unlock new opportunities and efficiencies within your operations.

Please consider this proposal carefully. Should you require any additional information or have questions about the product, feel free to reach out to me directly. I am here to assist you every step of the way.

Looking forward to the possibility of working together,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
